string-array.name: acridStats
string-array.item: Acrid is a melee-range hybrid who uses powerful poisons to melt tanky enemies.

string-array.name: artificerStats
string-array.item: The Artificer is a high burst damage survivor who excels in fighting large groups and bosses alike.

string-array.name: banditStats
string-array.item: The Bandit is a high-skill combo character that can dish out devastating backstabs while weaving in and out of stealth.

string-array.name: captainStats
string-array.item: The Captain is a unique survivor that can control the battlefield with utility and damage - with help from the UES Safe Travels.

string-array.name: commandoStats
string-array.item: The Commando is a jack-of-all-trades character that is reliable in all situations of the game.

string-array.name: engineerStats
string-array.item: The Engineer is a unique class that requires planning and positioning to be successful.

string-array.name: hereticStats
string-array.item: The Heretic is a powerful character who can only be accessed through extraordinary means.

string-array.name: huntressStats
string-array.item: The Huntress is an extremely mobile but fragile survivor with a high damage output.

string-array.name: loaderStats
string-array.item: The Loader is a slow but powerful bruiser that can use her grappling hook to uniquely navigate the environment.

string-array.name: multStats
string-array.item: MUL-T is an aggressive survivor who has the tools necessary for any job!

string-array.name: mercenaryStats
string-array.item: The Mercenary is a high skill melee survivor that uses his many dodges to weave in and out of combat.

string-array.name: rexStats
string-array.item: REX is a half robot / half plant that uses HP to cast devastating skills from a distance. The plant nor the robot could survive this planet alone - but thankfully they have each other.

string-array.name: voidFiendStats
string-array.item: The Void Fiend is a corrupted survivor that fluctuates between a controlled and corrupted form, each with different strengths and weaknesses. Managing this curse has become its fate.
